sentences.sContent: You no doubt noticed the ellipsis in the code above.
sentences.sContent_eng: You no doubt noticed the ellipsis in the code above.
sentences.sCn: 您一定注意到上述代码中的省略号。

sentences.sContent: Click the ellipsis for the relationship expression and add the following logic to the relationship definition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Click the ellipsis for the relationship expression and add the following logic to the relationship definition.
sentences.sCn: 单击关系表达式的省略号，并向关系定义中添加如下逻辑。

sentences.sContent: Named and variadic parameters can be used in the same function, simply by placing the variadic ellipsis after the list of named parameters.
sentences.sContent_eng: Named and variadic parameters can be used in the same function, simply by placing the variadic ellipsis after the list of named parameters.
sentences.sCn: 可以在同一个函数中同时使用命名参数和可变参数，只需要将可变参数的省略号放在命名参数列表之后。

trans.tranOther: when words are deliberately left out of a sentence, though the meaning can still be understood. For example, you may say ‘He’s leaving but I’m not’ instead of saying ‘He’s leaving but I’m not leaving.’
